name: ssvid
description: ssvid

name: gap_id
description: gap id (has of ssvid, gap_start, gap_start_lat, and gap_start_lon)

name: gap_start
description: the timestamp of the position at the beginning of the gap

name: gap_end
description: the timestamp of the position at the end of the gap

name: gap_hours
description: length of the gap

name: gap_distance_m
description: distance between start and end positions

name: gap_implied_speed_knots
description: implied speed during the gap based on gap_hours and gap_distance_m

name: gap_start_msgid
description: position message for start of gap

name: gap_start_lat
description: latitude at start of gap

name: gap_start_lon
description: longitude at start of gap

name: gap_start_course
description: course at start of gap (from AIS)

name: gap_start_speed_knots
description: speed (knots) at start of gap (from AIS)

name: gap_start_class
description: AIS device class at start of gap

name: gap_start_receiver_type
description: receiver type at start of gap

name: gap_start_distance_from_shore_m
description: distance from shore (meters) at start of gap (using rasterized distance)

name: gap_start_distance_from_port_m
description: distance from nearest port (meters) at start of gap (using rasterized distance)

name: gap_start_eez
description: nearest EEZ at start of gap

name: gap_start_rfmo
description: nearest RFMO at start of gap

name: gap_end_msgid
description: position message for end of gap

name: gap_end_lat
description: latitude at end of gap

name: gap_end_lon
description: longitude at end of gap

name: gap_end_course
description: course at end of gap (from AIS)

name: gap_end_speed_knots
description: speed (knots) at end of gap (from AIS)

name: gap_end_class
description: AIS device class at end of gap

name: gap_end_receiver_type
description: receiver type at end of gap

name: gap_end_distance_from_shore_m
description: distance from shore (meters) at end of gap (using rasterized distance)

name: gap_end_distance_from_port_m
description: distance from nearest port (meters) at end of gap (using rasterized distance)

name: gap_end_eez
description: nearest EEZ at end of gap

name: gap_end_rfmo
description: nearest RFMO at end of gap

name: positions_12_hours_before
description: number of positions in the 12 hours before the gap start

name: positions_12_hours_before_sat
description: number of satellite positions in the 12 hours before the gap start

name: positions_12_hours_before_ter
description: number of terrestrial positions in the 12 hours before the gap start

name: is_closed
description: 1 if the gap is closed, 0 if the gap is open
